extendedInfo.description: Voicemail Notifier was designed to give back users there native and stock voice mail features.This is especially useful for people who have had there phones flashed / unlocked to anotherservice provider. This is also helpful for Sprint users, as Sprint has removed the standardMWI feature. This app restores this feature. It gives you 100% like stock functionality including voice mail count. This is not intended to replace your voice mail notification if its already working.This app uses little to no resources and NO battery drain. It works 100% in the background.It currently has 3 permissions it uses DIRECTLY CALL PHONE NUMBERS	This is to allow it to call your voice mail directly from notificationREAD PHONE STATUS AND IDENTITY	This allows the program to get your voice mail number that is storedRUN AT START UP	This allows the program to run each boot and start its service.That's it no other permissions needed, no hidden ad's, no shortcuts created nothing.

reviews.title: Does not work! No response from Developer.
reviews.comment: Got this app for my Galaxy Note, after flashing CM10. Thorough disappointment - the app does NOTHING.  No response from the developer either, which is extremely disappointing!!! Avoid and save your money.
reviews.author: Karthik B

reviews.title: Trash
reviews.comment: It didn\'t work! Need I say more.
reviews.author: Tina Roper

reviews.title: Great app for flashing to Cricket
reviews.comment: James at my local Cricket Authorized Store in Lakewood, Colorado flashed my Sprint HTC Evo 4g for me.  He did a great job, but we just couldn\'t get any third party voicemail app to load properly to be able to restore the voicemail notification icon.  Finally we loaded Voicemail Notifier.  It took about 90 seconds to install, it set itself up on the phone unmanaged and began to work immediately.  I now have the original voicemail function restored to my flashed phone.  Icon pops up, swipe the notification bar, tap the notification message and it takes you right into your voicemail.  Awesome app and great service from James at Cricket in Lakewood, CO!
reviews.author: Kevin McAlister

reviews.title: Works on GN2
reviews.comment: Flashed my phone to Boost Mobile on my Galaxy Note II and it works perfectly with this phone.
reviews.author: Daimien Taylor

reviews.comment: This saved my life thank you...... I had my phone flashed to cricket and my voicemail never alerted me. This fixed it love it..

reviews.title: Does nothing!
reviews.comment: I want my money back! App just does not work. Very disappointed. I needed this after flashing phone to Straight Talk. I\'m pleased with everything else after the flash, but I really miss voice mail notification.
